name: The Bizarre Adventure
description:
In a village there was a story often told among the children. It stated “ Deep within the forest existed a lake that seemed like any other, but deep within it resides a dragon. This dragon once brought fear and destruction to anywhere it crossed paths but now is deep in slumber. A young child heard this story like many others but believed it was a story to keep children from straying to far into the forest. Until, they were visited by a witch in their dream. Now tasked with obtaining a sword, a jewel, and a pendant for the witch, the child must set off on adventure.

Member of The Four_teenth Floor: Carol Zhao, Darnell Foster, Laeticia London, Peng, Shen
